com.example.test1

Class PointerDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.example.test1.PointerDrawable

  • public class PointerDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    Used to show if an AR plane has been found If it has been found an green circle will appear in the center If not found an Gray X will appear in the center
